fields.name: Physics
fields.attack_description: You read aloud from your unnecessarily expensive text making them think too much

fields.description:
You try your best to teach this thing intro physics... you don't know what's going on anymore.
It's never heard such colorful language...
fields.name: Tutor intro physics

fields.description: You show this thing how Newton's 2nd law works.... by applying a force from your fist to it's unmoving face or front, or whatever it has
fields.name: Newton's 2nd Law

fields.description: After spending 3 hours lecturing how magnets work, the minds of those around you have shut down.... they start walking into everything
fields.name: How magnet's work

fields.description: Using the magic of your keyboard you dazzle them with hundreds of printed strings of "Hello, world!"
fields.name: Hello World

fields.description: Being smart you enable your debug mode while working on big project, which is just too smart for your opponent.
fields.name: DEBUG mode True

fields.description: After having disabled your debug mode and pushed your code live, you encountered a catastrophic failure. Enraged you smash your keyboard into the first thing you see, which happens to be your opponent.
fields.name: DEBUG mode False

fields.description: You pass your mysterious ball into you opponent's face.
fields.name: Pass the ball

fields.description: You start to form a plan, which causes untold confusion in your opponent.
fields.name: Huddle

fields.description: You gracefully get out of harm's way and dazzle your opponent in the process
fields.name: Ballet leap

fields.description: You dance out you inner feelings, causing you opponent to feel enlightened.
fields.name: Interpretive

fields.description: You grab your opponent round and round and proceed to Do-si-do all over their face.
fields.name: Square Dance

fields.description: From the precise movements and perfect patterns of your performance, you cause your opponent to reconsider ever dancing again.
fields.name: Ballroom

fields.description: After watching you perform Hamlet as a one man show, you opponent is wondering how Hamlet and Claudius could ever be different people
fields.name: Hamlet (the one man show)

fields.description: You call in the stage crew, not to rearrange the set, but to rearrange you opponent's face
fields.name: Stage Crew

fields.description: You opponent is left awestruck from the majesty that was Hamlet, the might space epic.
fields.name: Hamlet (in space)

fields.description: You draw a caricature of you opponent highlighting their deepest flaws.
fields.name: Caricature

fields.description: You start wildly throwing your paint at your opponent, not noticing you smash them with a few unopened cans.
fields.name: Abstract expressionism

fields.description: You get into the zone, creating just luscious landscapes, with many, many little green trees and happy bushes.
fields.name: Landscape
Mono
fields.attack_description: Great... you got it, even though you are not sure how, everyone else seems to think they know.... oooh, you were kissing...

fields.name: Fashion zombies
fields.attack_description: Mumbling about sales and designer labels the crowd slowly shambles into you.

fields.name: Flash Mob
fields.attack_description: They appear out of nowhere, bust out a full choreographed routine then slip back into the shadows.

fields.name: Flying hacky sack
fields.attack_description: flies around randomly until it accidentally hits you

fields.name: Mono
fields.attack_description: Great... you got it, even though you are not sure how, everyone else seems to think they know.... oooh, you were kissing...

fields.name: Uncommon cold
fields.attack_description: It atempts to feed off of your chicken soup, stress, and dreams

fields.name: Crazy nurse
fields.attack_description: Wanting to draw blood for everything, even when you don't have an appointment, she, guess what... she tries to draw your blood now

fields.name: Crazed fan
fields.attack_description: It's loud foam finger, louder outfit, and even louder face paint assault any sense of taste you have.

fields.name: Sticky Floor
fields.attack_description: You don't know what it is, why it's that color, or why you are stuck to it... all you know is it's gross beyond measure.

fields.name: Foul ball
fields.attack_description: Another thing flying at your face, you just dealt with something like this on the Quad... damnit

fields.name: Evil professor
fields.attack_description: Tossing at you pop quizzes that are 90% of your grade and reminding you that you need this class to graduate

fields.name: Uber nerd
fields.attack_description: While thinking it really is only a super nerd, it corrects you using the power of it's mind

fields.name: Forgotten homework
fields.attack_description: No longer wanting to stay in the past, it's come not only to remind you it exists, but also of its brethren

fields.name: Mystery meat
fields.attack_description: You don't what it is... or why it looks like it has teeth, actually you don't want to know.... did it just smile?

fields.name: Vending machine from hell
fields.attack_description: It crushes your dreams of a quick snack while it crushes your bones after having fallen on you

fields.name: Pizza
fields.attack_description: It's college pizza, not too good, but also not terrible... I mean it's edible, but since it's all you really eat, it's kind of draining
